product_name: Isis Zola Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Backpackers and hikers will enjoy the women's Isis Zola Capri Pants. Longer length keeps you covered and a comfort waistband is designed especially for packs. Nylon/spandex fabric offers you stretch for freedom of movement. Flat, clean waistband feels comfortable under a backpack hipbelt. 4 pockets, including 1 secure zippered pocket on lower thigh, stash small items. Isis Zola Capri Pants feature an 18-in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Backpackers and hikers will enjoy the women's Isis Zola Capri Pants. Longer length keeps you covered and a comfort waistband is designed especially for packs.
